entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY, Kinngait
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:14 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle. Fog. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of light snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow and risk of freezing drizzle. Fog dissipating in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
